title: New Zealand vs Ireland - Rugby World Cup Quarter-Final 2019: Live score and updates in Japan
text:
New Zealand take on Ireland in their Rugby World Cup quarter-final clash in Japan as they look to progress to the semi-final to take on either England or Australia.

Jonathan Sexton and Co will be hoping they can repeat their Autumn International win last year against the All Blacks which saw Joe Schmidt's men prevent New Zealand scoring a single try against them to win 16-9.

Steve Hansen's men didn't lose a single one of their games in the pool stage with Italy escaping with a draw after their match was cancelled due to Typhoon Hagibis as All Blacks look to exploit Ireland's weaknesses that Japan unveiled.

Sportsmail's James Dutton will provide live RWC 2019 coverage of All Blacks vs Ireland including score, sin bins, injuries, substitutions and more.
description: All Blacks take on Ireland in their Rugby World Cup quarter-final clash in Japan as they look to progress to the semi-final to take on either England or Australia. Follow LIVE ACTION RIGHT HERE.
